name: tasseled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
decorated with a tassel or tassels: a tasseled window blind See
tassel
More examplesFewer examplesDraped round his shoulders was a tasseled white silk scarf.Wearing a rather absurd black tasseled fez, he delivered his speech slowly. A decorative curtain is edged with deep fringing and held in place by tasseled cord.a fabulous gold tasseled dress He slid into his own tasseled loafers and headed for the telephone at the far end of the hall.
